dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 9170 IH: To provide an additional appropriation for the Emergency Food and Shelter Program, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Norton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Appropriations

form.official-title: To provide an additional appropriation for the Emergency Food and Shelter Program, and for other purposes.

section.text: Division A of the Continuing Appropriations and Ukraine Supplemental Appropriations Act, 2023 (Public Law 117–180) is amended by inserting at the end (before the short title) the following new section:

In addition to amounts otherwise made available by section 101, there is appropriated $50,000,000 for an additional amount for fiscal year 2023, to remain available until expended, for the Federal Emergency Management Agency—Federal Assistance account, to be made available to the emergency food and shelter program for purposes of providing shelter and other services to families and individuals encountered by the Department of Homeland Security.
